titleStmt.title: A true relation of the rising of the Club-men in Sussex. As it was related to William Lenthall Esq; Speaker to the Honorable House of Commons, by an eye-witnesse of the same. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Eye-witnesse.
Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
